lead.p: slice â€” Slices out a part of a string and returns it.

parameters.p: Positive values count from beginning of string, whele negative count from the end.

example.heading: slice example
example.code: console.log('Hello World'.slice(1)); // ello World console.log('Hello World'.slice(-1)); // d console.log('Hello World'.slice(1, -1)); // ello Worl console.log('Hello World'.slice(-4, -1)); // orl console.log('Hello World'.slice(0, 1)); // H

p.xref: Article on substr vs substring vs slice
